name: Robot Rodeo
description:
[Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021]

Your name is Spuds McGraff and you’re the robo-sheriff of the Junk Ranch in the Great Desert. While on your rounds, the ranch's animal-bots stole your badge (as well as your 9 spare badges)! You must recover your badges to keep the town safe!

CONTROLS:
WASD: Move
R: Restart

In this game when you jump on an enemy, they attach to your cyber-boots, which allows you to ride the enemy, and gain its properties! This process stacks, meaning you can stack enemies on top of each other to gain height and solve puzzles to collect the star!
